string.text: Thanks for your help, stalker! If it weren't for your timely help, I would have been dead for now.
What are you doing in here?
Sitting and putting our backs under the bullets. Ask Mole for details. He's a chief here.
Gosh! It was a mayhem here, I won't bear this to the enemy. Those militaries are really becoming cheeky.
Where is Agroprom Research Institute situated?
It's at a stone's throw from here. Walk by road to the West - it leads straightly to one of the Institute's gates.
Who is fixed to Institute's terrotory?
How is it better to get in there?
Thanks.

There you might find the largest military base ever seen. I'm not up on how many of them are there, but my experience says that it's not less than a platoon there. They are well armed, and you won't succeed in breaking through, but if you decide to - they'll wipe you out without any hesitation.

It's better to be penetrated at night, but I guess that the base is heavily guarded in the nighttime, they've got outposts everywhere. Watch for the schedule of guards relieve, then you'll have a real chance to get into the territory undetected and leave it the same way. In general I've heard that there is a soldier hiding somewhere at the swamps, who escaped from this base. How haven't he been put away, I wonder? Press on him - he'll tell you everything.
I've saved you. Tell me, what are you doing here?
Stalker, thanks for your help, I own you my life. My team and I have found a decent place here to collect artifacts, and our base is at the factory.
Artifacts? Why then the militaries attacked you? I can hardly believe that it was over the artifacts!
Yes, exactly artifacts. I don't know why they attacked us. I'm only trying to survive in this complicated world!
Tell me what: do you know anything about the stalker named Gunslinger?
Yes, I've heard about him, he was likely to make his living in these places, it's a pretty good spot here. But he has gone long ago, but I don't know exactly when and where. I know nothing more.
I've saved you! Tell me, you weren't sitting here with no purpose, were you? Otherwise, why have the military task forces landed here?
Well, I know something more about Gunslinger.
Yeah? I do need to know this!

I've got an information about the location of the Gunslinger's cache! Truly the cache is located not at the factory, but under it! Can you see this hole? This is one of the entrances to the tunnels under the factory, and I don't even know the exact size of the dungeons, but the cache is somewhere there!
How can I find the cache?
As a sign of gratitude I give you the flash-drive containing the information, look into everything further on your own.
If you have tricked me, I'm gonna find you and finish what the militaries couldn't!
I don't trick you. I know that no one believes no one here, but you've got a short choice.
You're right, have to go, see you!
Grey told me, that you knew something about Gunslinger's cache!

As far as you are Grey's friend, then it turns out that you are a friend of mine as well, especially after the mayhem with the militaries. If it were not for your timely help I guess I would have become the lunch for the blind dogs.
Okay-okay. So what is with the cache?

I know where Gunslinger's cache is situated. It is right here at the Agroprom or better to say under it. Tunnels are everywhere, they lead under the factory and not only there. But as for myself, I haven't got any desire to go there - I'll have to save my ass from the militaries, cure the wounds. Go there yourself if you wish to. I'll copy the information on your PDA.
How can I get into the tunnels?

This is one of the variety of entrances, you'll get into one of the tunnels through it and then do as you like, I've got no map of these tunnels, while they're very long with an abundance of rooms and being very tangled.
What else do you know?
I know nothing more, I've already told you everything I knew, you'll have to act further on your own. Wish you luck.
I have to go, take care!!!
Help!
Awright!
Don't shoot, bro!
Who are you?
Name Eye.
What are you doing here?
And what's your business in it?
Just asking, don't get too excited.

Alright, I'm coming from the factory, which lies westwards straight by the road. I don't know how, but our group has been detected by the militaries. I didn't wait for their return and left. Hopefully our guys has already fled, otherwise they won't have survived for long - you've seen the chopters, haven't you.
Clear, thanks.
What interesting is happening here?
Do you know about Ratsnarer? The information will cost you 30 cash.
Deal.
There is a local hero here, called Ratsnarer. He inhabits the bogs. He bred so many rats in the collectors that they will soon be eating cops alive.
Great. Thanks.
Tell me about the collectors in detail.
Collectors... Yes, usual stinky sewer system. Draws the waste waters aside from Agroprom to the nearest reservoir.
Great. Cheers. Take care.
Yeah-yeah. Thanks.
There is nothing more I can tell you.
I haven't got sufficient funds.
I'm not intersted in it.
What's interesting happening here?
Nothing at all.
Got it. Bye!
I've got several questions.
What do you want to know?
Where can I have a peaceful rest?
What's interesting around here?
How many do you require?
Here, take money, tell me where it is.
Ah, screw you...
Thanks.
Yeah, there is a place! But you'll have to pay a fair bit!

Everything was calm and quiet until recently. And now for some reason the militaries have blown up. They kill everyone. They've driven out bandits not long ago. Someone is said to make their way to the catacombs.
Well, thirty and we're done?

There is car at the radioactive bog, it's possible to settle there for a while. However the territory around it is radiated, so it's better to approach to the car from thewestern swamp side. And one more thing: we've seen a soldier there not so long ago, apparently from Intitute's base. He has been camping there for several days.Perhaps, he has flew off the handle - he's gonna die there alone.
Bye!
Tell me about this place.

This is the territory of Agroprom Research Institute. The building itself is situated on the south-west. And the large factory to the north - is manufacturing and technology base of the institute. The building was abandoned for a long time, it has passed into momories, there is nothing to steal from there whatsoever. But recently militaries started to search for something there actively.
Tell me about the institute in detail.

This is a legendary institute. Until the catastrophe in 1986 there was only the lone standing building of Gramineae selection and genetics institute. And there was an experimental field on the territory of the factory. After the accident the insitute has been closed and the field was burned. And then it was remembered, whitewashed, fenced around, barracks were built. Factory was constructed on the fields. I don't have a clue what were they doing in that institute, but they didn't spare money, I'm telling you.
Tell me about the factory in detail.

This factory has been built in the end of 80s. Supposedly with the aim to build and check the cars, which are capable to work up the radioactive soil. But as far as I know, no one has seen a single car there. Now it's totally empty. Only stalkers like to stop there. It's said that this place is a safe one if not to poke a nose into the dark corners.
Thanks.
O! Humanlike has come! What have brought you here?
Hello.
What have you come here for?
Tell me about the collector. How can I get in, where are the entrances and exits?

It's rather dangerous in collector now. There are six entrances. Two of them are on the Institute's territory - where the military base is. Institute's territory is patrolled. Captain has got the patrol schedule.
Where have you got all this information from?
Rats told me.
Clear. See you. Good luck.
I've got nothing. See you.
Who are you?
I live here. If this stuff can be called a life. I'm breeding rats in collectors, bothering militaries in the Institute this way.
I'm Ratsnarer.
What are you doing in this swamp?
Aaaa... got it... Unfortunately I'm not a character of this fairy tale. Hehehe...
What are you, greenhorn, doing here?
I'm hiding. I don't want any problem. Don't shoot!
How did you get here? Whom are you hiding from? Say!
What are the catacombs?
What can you tell me about your base?
What are you planning to do next?
Well, you may camp here, I'm not going to kill you. Don't you die of hunger.

I'm from the reconnaissance detachment. We've been sent to the collectors, in order to examine what was happening under the base. There is a total mess. The others are most likely to be dead. But I have no desire to get back to the base. They always cut all ways for us in the Zone, damn bastards.
Underground tunnels. They lead from the Institute outside its territory, I'll show you the exits. The maps of the catacombs themselves aren't in my posession.

I can draft the guard plan for you. I'll also mark the captain's cab on the map - he's a scum indeed. If you want to break your way to the base, listen to what I'm gonna tell you, my lad: gates are virtually impassable, the most appropriate way is through that damn catacombs. And one more thing: the main building is usually empty during the watch switch.
Hem. I don't know. According to the military laws I'm supposed to be a slacker. I'll hide my ass for a while.
